sprite.script: var value = this.imageSize if (value == 0) value = 1 else value = 0 this.imageSize = value this.invalidate()

this.trigger("initializeFileList") this.colorIndex = 0 this.colors = [0, 255, 171, 85] this.imageSize = 0
var slide = this.getVariable("SLIDESHOW_SETTING") if (slide == "ON") { this.timer = new Timer this.timer.target = this this.timer.func = this.trigger this.timer.onCallback = function () { this.func.call(this.target, "doNext") this.schedule(3000) } this.timer.schedule(3000) } else this.timer = null

script.params: window, index, u, v, x, y, width, height
